Class ACAQMutableTraitDeclaration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.acaq5.api.traits.ACAQMutableTraitDeclaration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACAQParameterCollection, ACAQTraitDeclaration
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ACAQJavaTraitDeclaration, ACAQJsonTraitDeclaration

    public abstract class ACAQMutableTraitDeclaration
extends Object
implements ACAQTraitDeclaration, ACAQParameterCollection
    A mutable implementation of ACAQTraitDeclaration
